name: Punct!
description:
"In a minimalist world of blackness and colored balls, inject movement, and expand your system to enjoy a contemplative, fullfilling experience. A scoring system is embedded in the game, allowing the player to look at his performance in an objective manner."

Punct! is an 2D Arcade game project for Tablet and PC, developped by a team of 4 french students in ICAN (Paris).
